entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:25 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 2:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
